alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:12PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL CAMPBELL COUNTY THROUGH 700 PM MDT... At 611 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Powder River Rest Area, or 26 miles west of Gillette, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Campbell County south and southwest of Gillette. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 99 and 106. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
